name: Tank Mechanic Simulator VR
description:
MORE GREAT GAMES:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1887260/Timberman_VR__grab_an_axe_chop_trees_beat_records/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839190/House_Flipper_Pets_VR/



Fix, build and renovate highly detailed and fully interactive tanks (German, USA or Soviet), armored cars or self-propelled guns. Experience a realistic simulator game of being a Tank Mechanic. Grow your repair service business and start your own tank museum.

Start the engine of a newly renovated tank, and feel its former power!

Tank Mechanic Simulator in VR is a new experience



Renovate II World War tanks. Transform them from rusty and ruined to fully working:

  • De-rust the tank
  • Sandblast the tank
  • Apply primer paint to the tank
  • Apply final paint to the tank (factory paint)
  • Add custom paint, camouflage, color, decal in the paint room
  • Sell the tank or put it in your museum to gain money and reputation

Take tanks fully apart by using different tools:

  • Rust Removal Tool
  • Sand Blaster
  • Paint Gun
  • Hammer
  • Grinder - to cut and grind
  • Wrench pistol - to quickly disassemble rusted screws/bolts

And yes... drive a tank in virtual reality on the training ground!

Create and manage your museum

Change the way your garage looks like

... and more 🛠️
